pages.text: SKIP TO CONTENT CLOSE Home Our Inn Rooms & Suites Offers Meetings + Events Overview Event Spaces Request For Proposal Charleston Gallery 360 in the Making Southern Legacy French Quarter Inn Carefully Curated, Always Inspiring A distinctive luxury hotel for sophisticated travelers, French Quarter Inn offers guests a nuanced experience while visiting one of the country’s most inspiring destinations. Here, Old World charm meets Charleston’s authentic Southern hospitality with extensive daily amenities in a comfortably upscale setting. Read More Delight in Every Bite Complimentary Breakfast Indulge in a complimentary European artisanal breakfast every day of your stay. Breakfast can be enjoyed in your room, at our lobby, or on our courtyard terrace. Read More Delight in Every Bite Wine & Cheese Reception Enjoy a diverse selection of cured meats, cheeses, and other delightful bites in our lobby before you step out for the evening. Read More Delight in Every Bite Cocktail Corner Treat yourself to a flavorful cocktail or order your favorite spirit on the rocks at our charming lobby bar. Read More Delight in Every Bite Cookies & Milk Start winding down for the evening with pre-turndown treats that include freshly baked cookies and milk served in the lobby. Read More Meetings & Events Designed for Warm Conversations Inspired by the Holy City and its European ties, our Inn is a sanctuary for those seeking to experience something beyond the ordinary. Plan an event where your guests feel welcomed into a thoughtful atmosphere, a refined gathering with attentive service. Read More City Market 1-Minute Walk King Street 6-Minute Walk Marion Square 15-Minute Walk Waterfront Park 7-Minute Walk Rainbow Row 10-Minute Walk The Battery 19-Minute Walk White Point Garden 17-Minute Walk College of Charleston 12-Minute Walk St. Philips Church 2-Minute Walk Fort Sumter 10-Minute Boat Ride Colonial Lake 18-Minute Walk Location Stitched Into the Fabric of the Holy City Defined by cobblestone streets, iconic horse-drawn carriages, and pastel-hued Southern mansions, Charleston’s French Quarter district is a symbol of elegance, sophistication, and inspiration. It is often regarded as the Holy City’s cultural, historical, and artistic haven just footsteps away from the bustling City Market and top dining, shopping, and cultural destinations.
